# Maintenance and Inspections of Boilers

## Notice Type
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) to provide preventive maintenance and inspection services for boilers and hot water heaters at the Canadian Forces Station (CFS) Leitrim Base in Ottawa, Ontario.

## Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: WS3644254843
* Reference Number: Doc3985091440
* Amendment Number: 3
* Publication Date: 2023-07-26
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-09-07T14:00:00 EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2028-10-31

## Service Requirements

The contracting authority requires a provider to offer preventive maintenance and inspection services for boilers and hot water heaters, including all necessary tools, services, and labor. The scope of work includes inspections, cleaning, lubrication, testing, and calibration, as well as the provision of consumable items.

## Security Requirements

Bidders must be aware that security requirements are associated with this project. A mandatory site visit has been scheduled for August 23, 2023, at 10:00am EDT. Bidders must communicate with the contracting authority by August 11, 2023, at 14:00 EDT to confirm attendance and provide the necessary information.

## Contracting Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Information:
	+ Christine Seguin (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: christine.seguin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16985022?extsite=MTY5ODUwMjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Notice and Solicitation

A mandatory site visit has been scheduled to inspect the facility and discuss the project details. Bidders must attend the site visit to be considered for the contract.

The notice and solicitation can be found on Ariba Discovery and Canada Buys. Please note that the tender closing date has been extended to 2023-09-07T14:00:00 EDT. All bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive. I look forward to receiving your proposal!
